editorialNotes.standard: With exciting events, famous characters, and wild courses, Nintendo's legendary kart-racing series burns rubber on mobile.
editorialNotes.short: Tour the world and race on tracks in cities around the globe.

editorialNotes.standard: CSR knows how to supercharge a sequel. Drag-racing is as fun as ever - and you won’t believe how good it all looks. And now you can squash other players in Live Races, which is about as fun as it gets.
editorialNotes.short: Hit top speed and don't look back.

name: Traffic Rider
artistName: Skgames Yazilim Muhendislik Teknoloji Ltd. Sti.

editorialNotes.short: Are you ready to rule the roads with your motorbike?

name: Need for Speed No Limits Game

editorialNotes.standard: A glistening stretch of rain-soaked pavement lies before you. Will you drift, draft or smash your way to victory? Whatever your style, this iconic street racer delivers hugely fun arcade action. Impressive graphics make every Subaru, Porsche and McLaren a sight to behold, and a vast lineup of events gives you plenty of ways to show opponents your taillights. Individual races are enjoyably brief, and we got swept up in blazing through them to unlock the most exotic cars and discover the next challenges.

We’re blown away by the newest installment of EA’s popular racing franchise. We found ourselves gawking at reflections, lens flare, and scenery as we motored through hairpin turns at breakneck speeds. The improvements aren't just cosmetic, though—you'll find yourself stunned by the believable roars of engines and the huge variety of true-to-life cars and courses. RR3 also packs great new gameplay features like Time Shifted Multiplayer, which allows us to race asynchronously against friends in fierce tests of driving prowess.
Barrel through classic Disney locations as Mickey, Elsa, Mulan, Woody, and loads of other iconic characters in this thrilling racer.

editorialNotes.standard: Conquer street and sky in Gameloft’s fastest racing game yet, a mix of high-octane driving and incredible jumps that harkens back to the age of San Francisco Rush and classic Burnout. Pairing white-knuckle action with an array of career and online modes, it sets a new standard for arcade racers on the App Store.
